General.Name: HangZhou Radical Energy Saving Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hang Zhou Radical Energy-Saving Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of automotive bearings for automobile industry. It offers wheel bearings and hub units, tapered roller bearings, belt tensioners and pulleys, clutch release bearings, tripods for C.V. joints, and other products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
